text:
By creating 100k connections with single text message exchanging between server and clients it takes over 6GB of memory. On other server it takes a half memory (around 3 GB).

What are the parameters/buffers to address in order to avoid this issue?


Thanks, 
Cristian

text: Bugzilla is not a support forum. Please direct your question to the Tomcat users' mailing list.
